commit.message:
Increase minimal required version of PyZMQ to 24.0.0

This matches the one set in IPykernel.
CI: Minor fixes in our Github actions files

Increase minimal required version of IPykernel to 6.29.3

This is necessary to fix hangs with interactive Matplotlib backends
under certain situations.
